# Number of off target loci with coverage 0

```{R}
coverageMatrixAnnaFile="/home/merly/git/cph-visit/coverage-analysis/empirical/data/anna/offtarget1.coverage.matrix.per.target.txt"
coverageMatrixSwiftFile="/home/merly/git/cph-visit/coverage-analysis/empirical/data/swift/offtarget1.coverage.matrix.per.target.txt"
coverageMatrixAnna=read.table(coverageMatrixAnnaFile, stringsAsFactors=F)
coverageMatrixSwift=read.table(coverageMatrixSwiftFile, stringsAsFactors=F)
totalOffTargetsAnna=nrow(coverageMatrixAnna)
totalOffTargetsSwift=nrow(coverageMatrixSwift)


covTargetAnna=rowSums(coverageMatrixAnna)
covTargetSwift=rowSums(coverageMatrixSwift)
lociOfftargetCapturedAnna=totalOffTargetsAnna-sum(covTargetAnna==0)
lociOfftargetCapturedSwift=totalOffTargetsSwift-sum(covTargetSwift==0)
d1=lociOfftargetCapturedAnna/totalOffTargetsAnna
d2=lociOfftargetCapturedSwift/totalOffTargetsSwift

mean(d1,d2)
```
